original_text: Ye shall walk in all the ways which the Lord your God hath commanded you, that ye may live, and that it may be well with you, and that ye may prolong your days in the land which ye shall possess.
korean_text: 너희 하나님 여호와께서 너희에게 명령하신 모든 도를 행하라 그리하면 너희가 살 것이요 복이 너희에게 있을 것이며 너희가 차지한 땅에서 너희의 날이 길리라

sentences.original_text: Ye shall walk in all the ways
which the Lord your God hath commanded you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 하나님 여호와께서 너희에게 명하신 길로

sentences.original_text: and that it may be well with you
sentences.korean_translation: 또 너희가 잘 되게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: and that ye may prolong your days
sentences.korean_translation: 또 너희의 날을 길게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: in the land which ye shall possess
